content: घ्रा {c1c} <ab>P.</ab> (जिघ्रति, जघ्रौ, अघ्रात्-अघ्रासीत्, घ्रात-घ्राण) {@--1@} To smell, smell at, perceive by smell; स्पृशन्नपि गजो हंति जिघ्रन्नपि भुजंगमः <ls>H. 3. 14</ls>; <ls>Bv. 1. 99.</ls> {@--2@} To kiss. {%--<ab>Caus.</ab>%} (घ्रापयति) To cause to smell; <ls>Bk. 15. 109.</ls> (Prepositions like अव, आ, उप, वि, सं &c. are added to this root without any material change of meaning; गंधमाघ्राय चोर्व्याः <ls>Me. 21</ls>; आमोदमुपजिघ्रंतौ <ls>R. 1. 43</ls>; see <ls>Bk. 2. 10</ls>; <ls n="Bk.">14. 12</ls>; <ls>R. 3. 3</ls>; <ls n="R.">13. 70</ls>; <ls>Ms. 4. 209</ls> also).
